Name: Ore Muncher Lore
Description: Learn how the Ore Munchers came to be
Author: PresDaGod
SendMessage: Talk to Cormac in the hub
You need mines IV to start this quest

Dialog.Cormac: Ah! What are you doing here!
No one is supposed to be in my lab and see what my secret project it!!!

Dialog.[PLAYER]: I'm sorry for intruding, I got lost on my way throughout the kingdom.

Dialog.Cormac: Hmm I suppose its alright, on one condition.
You must help me uncover how these Ore Munchers were created.
Ever since I was a young boy helping my family gather materials I have wondered how they were created and how they got here.

Dialog.[PLAYER]: I dont know too much about these creatures...
I'm not sure how much help i will be

Dialog.Cormac: Nonsense, I will tell you all you need to know and what to do

Dialog.[PLAYER]: Alright then I am happy to help!

Dialog.Cormac: The first thing I need you to do is go to the mines and kill some oremunchers in order to study their behaviors
